title: Nikola and ENGS Commercial Finance Co. Sign Agreement to Provide Financing for Zero-Emission Semi-Truck Sales - Nikola Motor
content: Nikola and ENGS Commercial Finance Co. Sign Agreement to Provide Financing for Zero-Emission Semi-Truck Sales  Nikola Motor
description: Nikola Corporation is dedicated to the advancement of innovative zero-emissions truck solutions, including the Nikola Two FCEV and the Nikola Tre BEV and FCEV, and the energy infrastructure required to make this feasible by pioneering a business model that will enable corporate customers to integrate next-generation truck technology, hydrogen fueling infrastructure and maintenance.
